https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yZGa4GFPd6jEBLYsquIURrMidEI.jpg "Blue Poles (2005), a wholly abstract piece which fills the screen with what appear to be white sparks, variously suggesting scraps of burning paper floating away from a fire, frost crystals on a window, or the visual phenomena which appear when holding one’s eyes shut tightly – a beautiful, haunting effect..."
